data.host: FQDN or IP Address of the Inverter
data.sun_up: The time that polling will start each day
data.sun_down: The time that polling will cease each day
data.name: A name for the Inverter (optional)

data.dc_strings: Number of DC strings in the array

error.already_configured: This inverter has already been added
error.time_range: Polling must cease after polling starts

abort.already_configured: This inverter has already been added
